fields.description: User address
fields.name: id

fields.description: Timestamp at which account first interacted with Polymarket
fields.name: creationTimestamp

fields.description: Timestamp at which account most recently interacted with Polymarket
fields.name: lastSeenTimestamp

fields.description: Total volume of this user's trades in USDC base units
fields.name: collateralVolume

fields.description: Total number of trades performed by this user
fields.name: numTrades

fields.description: Total volume of this user's trades in USDC scaled by 10^6
fields.name: scaledCollateralVolume

fields.description: Timestamp of last Buy or Sell transaction
fields.name: lastTradedTimestamp

fields.description: Markets in which user has provided liquidity
fields.name: fpmmPoolMemberships

fields.description: Markets in which the user has taken a position on the outcome
fields.name: marketPositions

fields.description: Purchases and sales of shares by the user
fields.name: transactions

fields.description: Split of collateral / outcome tokens into multiple positions
fields.name: splits

fields.description: Merge of more specific outcome tokens into collateral / more general outcome tokens
fields.name: merges

fields.description: Redemption of underlying collateral after a market has resolved
fields.name: redemptions

fields.description: Token address
fields.name: id

fields.description: Address which can resolve this condition
fields.name: oracle

fields.description: Question ID which corresponds to this condition
fields.name: questionId

fields.description: Number of possible outcomes for this condition
fields.name: outcomeSlotCount

fields.description: Timestamp at which this condition was resolved
fields.name: resolutionTimestamp

fields.description: Fraction of collateral assigned to each outcome
fields.name: payouts

fields.description: Market makers which are trading on this condition
fields.name: fixedProductMarketMakers

fields.description: Market maker address
fields.name: id

fields.description: Address which deployed this market
fields.name: creator

fields.description: Time at which this market was deployed
fields.name: creationTimestamp

fields.description: Hash of deployment transactions
fields.name: creationTransactionHash

fields.description: Token which is colleralising this market
fields.name: collateralToken

fields.description: Conditions which this market is trading against
fields.name: conditions

fields.description: Percentage fee of trades taken by market maker. A 2% fee is represented as 2*10^16
fields.name: fee

fields.description: Number of trades of any kind against this market maker
fields.name: tradesQuantity

fields.description: Number of purchases of shares from this market maker
fields.name: buysQuantity

fields.description: Number of sales of shares to this market maker
fields.name: sellsQuantity

fields.description: Number of times liquidity has been added to this market maker
fields.name: liquidityAddQuantity

fields.description: Number of times liquidity has been removed from this market maker
fields.name: liquidityRemoveQuantity

fields.description: Market volume in terms of the underlying collateral value
fields.name: collateralVolume

fields.description: Volume scaled by the number of decimals of collateralToken
fields.name: scaledCollateralVolume

fields.description: Global volume of share purchases in USDC base units
fields.name: collateralBuyVolume

fields.description: Global volume of share purchases in USDC scaled by 10^6
fields.name: scaledCollateralBuyVolume

fields.description: Global volume of share sales in USDC base units
fields.name: collateralSellVolume

fields.description: Global volume of share sales in USDC scaled by 10^6
fields.name: scaledCollateralSellVolume

fields.description: Fees collected in terms of the underlying collateral value
fields.name: feeVolume

fields.description: Fees scaled by the number of decimals of collateralToken
fields.name: scaledFeeVolume

fields.description: Constant product parameter k
fields.name: liquidityParameter

fields.description: Balances of each outcome token held by the market maker
fields.name: outcomeTokenAmounts

fields.description: Prices at which market maker values each outcome token
fields.name: outcomeTokenPrices

fields.description: Number of outcomes which this market maker is trading
fields.name: outcomeSlotCount

fields.description: Timestamp of last day during which someone made a trade
fields.name: lastActiveDay

fields.description: Number of shares for tokens in the market maker's reserves
fields.name: totalSupply

fields.description: Addresses which are supplying liquidity to the market maker
fields.name: poolMembers

fields.description: Transaction Hash
fields.name: id

fields.description: Timestamp at which funding addition occurred
fields.name: timestamp

fields.description: FPMM to which funding is being added
fields.name: fpmm

fields.description: Account adding funding
fields.name: funder

fields.description: Outcome tokens amounts added to FPMM
fields.name: amountsAdded

fields.description: Outcome tokens amounts refunded to funder
fields.name: amountsRefunded

fields.description: Liquidity shares minted to funder
fields.name: sharesMinted

fields.description: Transaction Hash
fields.name: id

fields.description: Timestamp at which funding removal occurred
fields.name: timestamp

fields.description: FPMM to which funding is being removed
fields.name: fpmm

fields.description: Account removing funding
fields.name: funder

fields.description: Outcome tokens amounts removed from FPMM
fields.name: amountsRemoved

fields.description: Liquidity shares burned by funder
fields.name: sharesBurnt

fields.description: funder address + pool address
fields.name: id

fields.description: Market to which funder is providing funding
fields.name: pool

fields.description: Account which is providing funding
fields.name: funder

fields.description: Amount of liquidity tokens owned by funder
fields.name: amount

fields.description: ID is empty string, this is a singleton
fields.name: id

fields.description: Number of unique traders interacting with Polymarket
fields.name: numTraders

fields.description: Number of trades of any kind for all market makers
fields.name: tradesQuantity

fields.description: Number of purchases of shares from any market maker
fields.name: buysQuantity

fields.description: Number of sales of shares to any market maker
fields.name: sellsQuantity

fields.description: Global volume in USDC base units
fields.name: collateralVolume

fields.description: Global volume in USDC scaled by 10^6
fields.name: scaledCollateralVolume

fields.description: Global fees in USDC base units
fields.name: collateralFees

fields.description: Global fees in USDC scaled by 10^6
fields.name: scaledCollateralFees

fields.description: Global volume of share purchases in USDC base units
fields.name: collateralBuyVolume

fields.description: Global volume of share purchases in USDC scaled by 10^6
fields.name: scaledCollateralBuyVolume

fields.description: Global volume of share sales in USDC base units
fields.name: collateralSellVolume

fields.description: Global volume of share sales in USDC scaled by 10^6
fields.name: scaledCollateralSellVolume

fields.description: concatenated userID + marketID
fields.name: id

fields.description: Market on which this position is on
fields.name: market

fields.description: Address which holds this position
fields.name: user

fields.description: The outcome which this position is supporting
fields.name: outcomeIndex

fields.description: Number of outcome shares that the user has ever bought
fields.name: quantityBought

fields.description: Number of outcome shares that the user has ever sold
fields.name: quantitySold

fields.description: Number of outcome shares that the user current has
fields.name: netQuantity

fields.description: Total value of outcome shares that the user has bought
fields.name: valueBought

fields.description: Total value of outcome shares that the user has sold
fields.name: valueSold

fields.description: Total value paid by the user to enter this position
fields.name: netValue

fields.description: Total amount of fees paid by user in relation to this position
fields.name: feesPaid

fields.description: Transaction Hash
fields.name: id

fields.description: Buy or Sell transaction
fields.name: type

fields.description: Timestamp at which transaction occurred
fields.name: timestamp

fields.description: Market which transaction is interacting with
fields.name: market

fields.description: Account performing transaction
fields.name: user

fields.description: Amount of collateral in trade
fields.name: tradeAmount

fields.description: Amount of collateral paid in fees
fields.name: feeAmount

fields.description: Index of outcome token being bought or sold
fields.name: outcomeIndex

fields.name: outcomeTokensAmount
